About This Content

Save money on additional content for Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 with the Season Pass and receive armour, weapon and Champion cosmetics from your favorite Space Marine chapters through four phases. Content can be downloaded from the store or in-game upon release.

Available at launch:

- Ultramarines Cosmetic Pack

Season 2 (before end of 2024)

- Dark Angels Cosmetic Pack
- Dark Angels Champion Pack
- Dark Angels Weapon Skin Pack

Season 3 (Winter 2025)

One Space Marine Chapter (to be revealed) will receive a Champion Pack, a Cosmetic Pack and a Weapon Skin Pack
Another Space Marine Chapter (to be revealed) will receive a Champion Pack.

Season 4 (Spring 2025)

One Space Marine Chapter (to be revealed) will receive a Champion Pack, a Cosmetic Pack and a Weapon Skin Pack
Another Space Marine Chapter (to be revealed) will receive a Champion Pack.

The Season Pass is included in the Ultra Edition and Gold Edition. Requires the base game Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2.

item.title: Zero Hour
item.description:
Title: Zero Hour
Genre: Action , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: M7 Productions , Attrito
Publisher: Attrito , M7 Productions
Release Date: Sep 9, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Aug 12, 2020




About This Game


Welcome to Zero Hour, a tactical FPS with online team-based action gameplay that is set across various locations in Bangladesh with real-life scale & resource management. Join forces with up to 10 players in intense cooperative missions, or go solo with up to 9 AI squad mates. Experience hostage rescue and bomb defusal missions that require calculated strategies in the dynamic 5v5 PvP mode. Shape your route through compelling situations by interacting with story-driven NPCs and engaging with various objectives.

Intense PvP Action


Engage in intense 5v5 PvP battles across various game modes, including bomb defusal, hostage rescue, and deathmatch. Experience competitive gameplay with a comprehensive leaderboard and tier system. Choose your loadout wisely, as limited guns and gadgets add a strategic layerâ€”you'll lose them upon dying, making every decision critical.

Intense Tactical Action


Zero Hour presents serious slow-paced, and methodically intense gameplay. The game offers authentic gunplay and scenarios, where quick thinking and strategic execution are essential for victory. Utilize the planning table to overview operations and formulate your approach before taking action. Remember, every move counts, and success demands teamwork, strategy, and precision.

Innovative Gameplay Elements and Weapon Customization


Explore over 18 diverse maps set across various locations in Bangladesh, featuring unique elements like functional elevators, bulletproof glass, and dynamic shutters for strategic advantages. Strategically utilize the breaker switch to control building lights, adding tactical depth to your missions.
Choose from over 23 distinct weapons and 18 utilities, emphasizing resource management and team coordination. Fine-tune your arsenal with detailed weapon customization, modifying rails, sights, and foregrips for optimal performance. Immerse yourself in realism by checking magazine bullet counts and repacking magazines for efficiency.

Dynamic Door Mechanics


Doors are your lifeline and your barrier. Infiltrate with caution as terrorists set traps and alarms. Meanwhile, attackers have an arsenal of over 4 breach options: kick, door rammer, C2 explosives, and back kick combined with grenades, ensuring a variety of strategies to navigate these vital entry points.

Dynamic Suspect AI


Face a variety of suspects, each with distinct behaviors. Some even wield suicide bombs, while others utilize sniper tactics in long-range maps. They even have the ability to sense incoming fire and strategically time their advances ensuring maximum safety. The dynamic nature of suspects keeps you on your toes, with no guarantee of their next move.

Your K9 Companion


The K9 Attack Dog feature brings an immersive and emotional experience to your missions. As the game starts, you're assigned as a dog handler, initiating your journey with a small, nameable puppy. Initially resting in a cage, the puppy soon becomes interactive and starts playing around, following the player through the training facility. After successfully completing three missions, the canine companion becomes available for mission deployment.

item.title: Hard Time III
item.description:
Title: Hard Time III
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie , RPG , Simulation
Developer: MDickie
Publisher: MDickie
Release Date: Sep 9, 2024




About This Game

The toughest prison sim in the yard is back to serve its 3rd consecutive sentence - combining classic moments from the OG with the best aspects of 2D, while putting out a few hits of its own! A fully developed police role challenges you to tackle crime from either side of the prison fence, while a larger world beyond it makes life worth living. Explore it with a wider range of vehicles, as well as animals and hundreds of fully interactive props & weapons. A combat system perfected by wrestling is further enhanced by mind-blowing gunplay that allows you to shoot at ANY moment! Reinforced by a creative crafting system, you've only ever run out of ammo when you've run out of ideas.

All now presented with higher resolution visuals and a smoother frame rate, with a wide variety of camera angles to fine-tune to your liking. Feel the consequences of your actions with grotesque scarring and severed limbs, as you fight to keep yours intact for as long as possible! Rub shoulders with hundreds of other characters, and stake your reputation on saying the right words to get through each day that unfolds in real-time. A new dialogue system allows YOU to initiate conversations instead waiting for the drama to come to you.

Upon earning access to the inbuilt editor, you can save your changes to each character to make the world your own. To prepare for a life of crime, you can also blow off steam in a special "Fight Scene" mode - where you select WHO fights WHERE and with WHAT to see who survives! This even extends to multiplayer opportunities, where other controllers can choose any other character on the scene to either help or hinder.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Unflinching depictions of violence between criminals, which often results in splatters of blood and may result in severed limbs. Regular threats of such violence in conversations.

Animals can be hunted for food.

Alcohol, tobacco, and medicinal drugs can be consumed - which affects your physical health and mental health.

The editor can be used to undress any character down to their underwear.

Romantic relationships between consenting adults may involve kissing & hugging.

item.title: Monica's Newlywed Life
item.description:
Title: Monica's Newlywed Life
Genre: Indie , RPG
Developer: Acerola
Publisher: Kagura Games
Franchise: Kagura Games
Release Date: Sep 6, 2024




About This Game




After their village was razed by the Demon Lordâ€™s army, Monica set out on a journey with her childhood friends Kyle and Sophia. Their goal was to defeat the Demon Lord, but since they werenâ€™t strong enough, they just ended up fighting his minions instead and doing odd jobs.

Their grand adventure comes to a sudden and disappointing end when theyâ€™re told a grand hero has already defeated the Demon King. Without a clear goal in life, Kyle takes the opportunity to propose to Monica, and they decide to settle down in the city of Clematis along with their party. Thereâ€™s just one catchâ€”thereâ€™s a one million gold fee to become a citizen of Clematis, and they have 60 days to come up with the hefty sum. Renting a room at an inn in the city, Kyle and his new wife will have to find a way to raise enough money.


With the Demon Lord defeated and enemies dwindling, adventuring isnâ€™t as lucrative as it used to be. Monica and her friends, Kyle, Sophia, and Milli, all need to find their own ways to earn gold as fast as possible. With her allies easily making their way into new jobs, Monica must look around town for odd jobs or fight her way through guild quests.

Work in the town bakery, become a research subject, or hire new allies to help fight sewer monsters. Just make sure not to let your stamina get too low! Stop by the shop and grab some items to boost your energy or upgrade your equipment!







Jobs
Work various jobs for people around the city to earn money! Collect or purchase different outfits to increase the number of jobs available to you. Different jobs are available on different days of the week, but you only have 60 days to earn enough money to settle in the city. It's a race against time! Carefully manage your stamina to earn enough money before the 60 days are up.

Quests
Thereâ€™s one other way to earn citizenship in Clematisâ€¦ and that's to become a B rank adventurer in the guild! Take on quests to earn money and increase your guild rank! Hire other adventurers to aid you in fighting bosses! Enjoy a series of dungeons and simple RPG combat as you rise through the ranks.
